title: post api polls create new poll
description: Test creating a new poll with valid question, options, and fingerprint. Verify response status 201 and returned pollId and shareCode.

title: post api polls validate poll creation input
description: Test poll creation with missing question or fewer than 2 options or more than 10 options. Verify response status 400 with validation error.

title: get api polls sharecode retrieve poll details
description: Test retrieving poll details by shareCode. Verify response status 200 with poll data, options, tallies, totalVotes, and hasVoted flag.

title: get api polls sharecode handle poll not found
description: Test retrieving poll details with non-existent shareCode. Verify response status 404 with poll not found error.

title: post api polls sharecode vote submit valid vote
description: Test submitting a valid vote with optionId and fingerprint. Verify response status 200 with success message and real-time vote update emitted.

title: post api polls sharecode vote handle invalid option
description: Test submitting a vote with invalid optionId or non-existent poll. Verify response status 404 with appropriate error.

title: post api polls sharecode vote prevent duplicate voting
description: Test submitting a vote with a fingerprint that already voted or from same IP exceeding rate limit. Verify response status 409 with already voted error.

title: post api polls sharecode vote handle closed poll
description: Test submitting a vote after poll is closed or expired. Verify response status 410 with poll no longer active error.

title: get api health check server status
description: Test health check endpoint to verify server is running. Verify response status 200 with status ok.
